experiences.description:
1. Built a grievance redressal portal with role-based access, admin panel, and officer dashboards for the Government of Odisha using React, Node.js, MySQL, Hostinger and Tailwind CSS.
2. Designed and delivered a responsive NGO portfolio website using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and optimal performance.
3. Created an AI agent to parse resumes and match skills with job listings using NLP, Python, AWS. And designed a dashboard to show skill gaps and recommend suitable roles.
 4. Developed a full-stack Resume Builder Web Application using React.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and AWS, featuring real-time resume preview, downloadable PDFs, and customizable templates.
 5. Ensured scalable, secure, and user-friendly interfaces across all projects.

1. Developed a Code Generator and own CMS, reducing development time by 40% in React Js and Serverless.
2. Engineered robust backend APIs in Serverless and Node.js for CRUD operations, Google Auth, and automated invoice generation with SMS/email reminders with seamless data retrieval from DynamoDB database, leading to a 25% reduction in frontend loading time and improved user experience.
3. Successfully resolved website bugs, leading to notable improvements in web functionality and speed.
4. Effectively managed database ensuring seamless integration and functionality.
